# Issue 46119

# When a module is inside $GOPATH/src, Package.Root should be set to Module.Dir
# instead of $GOPATH/src.

env GOPATH=$WORK/tmp
cd $WORK/tmp/src/test

go list -f {{.Root}}
stdout $PWD

-- $WORK/tmp/src/test/go.mod --
module test

-- $WORK/tmp/src/test/main.go --
package main

func main() {}
